TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TiffCompressOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the possible compression schemes for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap images.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Ccitt3, Ccitt4, and Rle require that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat> value be set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.BlackWhite%2A>. Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat> to any other value resets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder.Compression%2A> property value to Default.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder.Compression%2A> property.
[!code-cs[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/TiffEncoderDecoder/TiffEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-cpp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/tiffencoderdecoder/TiffEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-vb[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/TiffEncoderDecoder/TiffEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption Ccitt3 = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The CCITT3 compression schema is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption Ccitt4 = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The CCITT4 compression schema is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The encoder attempts to save the bitmap with the best possible compression schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption Lzw = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The LZW compression schema is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption None = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption Rle = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The RLE compression schema is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption Zip = int32(6)
